channel.title: [Hyperion 525] Uhh I don't know what to call this
channel.description:
How would I go about editing a dialogue-type text box like this: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/683ZzU6.jpg[/img]
I want to create another one of those "text boxes" (please do provide me with the proper name :S), accept the input, and do something with that input. How would I go about doing this?
Note: The most important part would be creating one of the "text boxes" and accepting the input. I can do the rest.
Thanks for any help :)

item.title: [Hyperion 525] Uhh I don't know what to call this
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

private void drawChatArea() {

That might be what you’re looking for. You can create your own input box there.
